column5: I was reading the Ottawa Sun this morning and came across a Jeff Morrison outdoors article.  It has a write up about some guy named Jamie who happens to be an avid Carp Fisherman.  By the time i reached the end of the article and saw a reference to his website, i knew it could only be one person.....Crazyhook.  Congrats CH on tieing the IGFA world record for Carp on a FR.      Too bad about the other Carp.  Link to Sun article  Cheers,  FOTB
Thanks for the heads up, FOTB. Congrats to you Jamie. Did you check out  the grail blurb at the bottom of the page?
Yes...I got a good chuckle out of that write up.   FOTB
Congrats Crazyhook...Landing a carp that size with light tackle (on a fly no less) is quite an achievement  WTG
It always makes me proud when I see an OFC'r getting good press for anything (fishing related is a bonus). I've yet to meet Jamie but I sure am looking forward to it! Good on you young man!

Thanks alot guys! I have caught the carp bug huge this season.. they are a huge challenge on the fly and there is nothing greater then watching the line start peeling off.  here are the pics...  http://www.filehive.com/files/0628/125poundcarpfly.jpg same girth as http://a123.g.akamai.net/f/123/12465/1d/me...0683.jpg?size=l
Dude,you are now the Grazer of all Grazer's Try the Alfred Special Poutine's,they love em on the O  Huge Carpasoraus
That Carp is massive! Great job! I can see how that would provide many hours of entertainment of such light equipment! Well done! HH
That's great Jamie  I love your comparison fish  Joey
Dang that's a nice fish!  Way to go Jaimie  Maureen
Does this mean fly fishing is the way to catch those sun bathing group of carps ?  What fly(s) is recommended???
